hotels.title: Opulent Five-Star Greek Island Villa Oasis with Private Beach, Three Restaurants & Rejuvenating Spa
hotels.description: An oasis of coastal opulence set on a magical private stretch of beach in one of Zakynthos’ most beautiful secluded bays, Porto Zante Villas & Spa is a stunning sight to behold. Providing five-star elegance around every corner, this boutique luxury resort boasts an array of award-winning private villas, each with unique views of the picturesque Ionian Sea. With modern stylings and supremely comfortable interior and exterior living spaces, unwind in the lush private garden, on the sun deck or in the spacious lounge and dining areas. Dine on your choice of exquisite Greek or tantalizing Asian cuisine at the resort’s restaurant offerings, indulge in a much-needed, rejuvenating massage at the onsite spa and toast to a holiday like no other with a refreshing waterfront cocktail.
